description: Creates a new OpenSearch Serverless collection. For more information, see Creating and managing Amazon OpenSearch Serverless collections.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key---value pairs) to associate with the OpenSearch Serverless collection. (dict) --- A map of key-value pairs associated to an OpenSearch Serverless resource. The key to use in the tag. The value of the tag.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key to use in the tag.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the collection.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the collection.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the collection.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the KMS key with which to encrypt the collection.

nested_items.name: standbyReplicas
nested_items.description: Creates details about an OpenSearch Serverless collection.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The Epoch time when the collection was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the collection was last modified.
